price: Kandi rwose, bose bazazanwa imbere yacu.
arabic: وَإِن كُلّٞ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٞ لَّدَيۡنَا مُحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-in kullun lammā jamīʿun ladaynā muḥ'ḍarūna
